thread.title: Payments Network clearXchange Gets Reboot
thread.title_full: Payments Network clearXchange Gets Reboot - WSJ

author: Robin Sidel
title: Payments Network clearXchange Gets Reboot
text:
Some of the countryâ€™s biggest banks are rebooting a venture to make it easier for consumers to send money to each other electronically.
PNC Financial Services Group Inc. and BB&T Corp. are joining clearXchange, a person-to-person payments network. The venture already includes Bank of America Corp., Capital One Financial Corp., First Bank, J.P. Morgan Chase & Co., U.S. Bancorp and Wells Fargo & Co.
